snippet.title: BRIXITY Gameplay Reveal Teaser
snippet.description:
An upcoming new game by Devsisters, the makers of Cookie Run!

More info on our official homepage:
https://www.playbrixity.com

Can you make Earth a more beautiful place? Explore your creative side and get ready to create and share a world of your imagination. Help rebuild Earth and restore polluted areas. Watch your city expand with new buildings and a growing population of Pipo! Share your custom creations with players across the Brixity universe and trade building blueprints to keep the creativity flowing! Explore without limits and bask in the calm and peaceful world of Brixity.

- Bring your imagination to life and build your dream city with high degree of freedom!

- Turn trash into resources to restore polluted areas to their former beauty and expand your city!

- Take in the calming atmosphere and create without having to worry about attacks or interruptions!

- Venture through the Brixity universe to visit other players’ cities, view and purchase their unique creations

- Assign your Pipo to complete tasks around the city, or send them off to neighboring cities to help other players!
